versos: (brim) Isaiah 30:33 - "Topheth has long been prepared; it has been made ready for the king. Its fire pit has been made deep and wide, with an abundance of fire and wood; the breath of the LORD, like a stream of brimstone, sets it ablaze.";;;

(lodging) Luke 9:12 - "Now the day began to wear away; and the twelve came and said to him, 'Send the crowd away, to go into the villages and countryside round about, to lodge and get provisions; for we are here in a lonely place.;;;
(ascend) Psalm 24:3 - "Who may ascend the mountain of the Lord Who may stand in his holy place";;;
(straight) Proverbs 3:6 - "In all your ways acknowledge him, and he will make straight your paths.";;;
(despise) Proverbs 14:21 - "Whoever despises his neighbor is a sinner, but blessed is he who is generous to the poor.";;;
(ziph) 1 Samuel 23:19 - "Then the Ziphites went up to Saul at Gibeah and said, 'Is not David hiding among us in the strongholds at Horesh, on the hill of Hakilah, south of Jeshimon'";;;
(shema) Deuteronomy 6:4 - "Hear, O Israel: The Lord our God, the Lord is one.";;;
(buildeth) Proverbs 14:1 - "Every wise woman buildeth her house: but the foolish plucketh it down with her hands.";;;

(achan) Joshua 7:1 - "But the people of Israel broke faith in regard to the devoted things, for achan the son of Carmi, son of Zabdi, son of Zerah, of the tribe of Judah, took some of the devoted things. And the anger of the Lord burned against the people of Israel.";;;
(zabdi) 2 Chronicles 29:12 - The following Levites were in charge: Mahath son of Amasai and Joel son of Azariah. Of the Kohathites: Kish son of Abdi and Azariah son of Jehallelel.;;;

(aven) Amos 1:5: "I will break also the bar of Damascus, and cut off the inhabitant from the plain of aven, and him that holdeth the sceptre from the house of Eden: and the people of Syria shall go into captivity unto Kir, saith the Lord.";;;
(ambush) 2 Samuel 5:23 - When David inquired of the Lord
(liers) Proverbs 17:4 - "A wicked doer giveth heed to false lips, and a liar giveth ear to a naughty tongue.";;;
(issued) 2 Kings 4:22 - "She called her husband and said, 'Please send me one of the servants and a donkey so I can go to the man of God quickly and return.'";;;

(slaying) "The sinners in Zion are afraid; fearfulness hath surprised the hypocrites. Who among us shall dwell with the devouring fire who among us shall dwell with everlasting burnings" - Isaiah 33:14 KJV;;;
(bottles) Job 32:19 - "Behold, my belly is as wine which hath no vent; it is ready to burst like new bottles.";;;
